alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued May 28 at 11:15AM PDT until May 29 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory today, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the Lake Wind Advisory Sunday, northwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Lakes affected include Topaz, Bridgeport, Mono, and Crowley. * WHEN...For the first Lake Wind Advisory, until 11 PM PDT this evening. For the second Lake Wind Advisory, from 8 AM to 8 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds may lead to travel restrictions for RVs, trailers, and other high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
